instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 00165 PFM006 and PPN001 errors in AHT
threads.message: Fans run high. I checked SMC VSENSE and ISENSE sections noticed when checking sensors that PCH_SML1ALERT_L is zero. I'm guessing that's bad news being that R2010 is good and diode mode not showing a short on the line?

threads.title: 00165 PFM006 and PPN001 errors in AHT
threads.message:
First, try disconnecting webcam.
Next step, test with known good trackpad flex/board.

threads.title: 00165 PFM006 and PPN001 errors in AHT
threads.message: No change. Also forgot to mention I did try swapping smc from 00165 board and no change.

threads.title: 00165 PFM006 and PPN001 errors in AHT
threads.message: If possible to log into macOS, then run HWMonitor and look for strange values.

threads.title: 00165 PFM006 and PPN001 errors in AHT
00165 PFM006 and PPN001 errors in AHT
threads.message:
grmacs, you should post screenshot of HWMonitor readings, something like attached.
You should install this one:  [URL]https://mac.softpedia.com/get/System-Utilities/HWMonitor.shtml[/URL]
